headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EVANS, PAUL REDMOND

snippet: EVANS--Paul Redmond, died on July 2 of heart failure. A longtime resident of Fishers Island, NY, Paul was born in New York City on October 3, 1958. Son of Katharine and Paul Evans he attended Buckley School, Lawrenceville and Boston University. Af...
lead_paragraph: EVANS--Paul Redmond, died on July 2 of heart failure. A longtime resident of Fishers Island, NY, Paul was born in New York City on October 3, 1958. Son of Katharine and Paul Evans he attended Buckley School, Lawrenceville and Boston University. After a career as a stock broker he retired to Fishers. He is survived by his five siblings, fourteen nieces and nephews and nine grandnieces and nephews whose birthdays he never failed to celebrate. He will be sorely missed. A memorial service will be held at The Union Chapel, Fishers Island, NY on August 13 at 1:15pm. In lieu of flowers, please consider contributions to Fishers Island Library or Island Health Project. 1/3
